data.title: A real treat for women looking for unique & stylish gifts and clothing
data.text: This boutique caters to young and old, professional and casual shoppers.  The jewelry is one-of-a-kind, and the clothing you may find nowhere else in the world!  Peggy is a very discriminating buyer with a great fashion eye.  She organizes fashion shows all over the county, is involved with too many organizations to count, and has a heart as big as the State of California!  Let her make suggestions; you'll be pleasantly surprised with her recommendations.  Don't hesitate to try new styles; she'll let you know if it works or (more importantly) if it's not right for you.
